object_name.value: Validate selected template is the CURRENT version

title.value: Used to validate if the selected template is the CURRENT version.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
Version $value(r_version_label[0]) is not the latest (''CURRENT'') version of ''$value(object_name)''.
dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where not exists (select * from cd_content_template(all) where r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)' and any r_version_label = 'CURRENT')
